name: redundant
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: redundant
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (especially of a word, phrase, etc.) unnecessary because it is more than is needed
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指词、短语等）多余的，不需要的，累赘的，啰唆的

example.eg: In the sentence "She is a single unmarried woman", the word "unmarried" is redundant.
example.egtrans: 在句子 She is a single unmarried woman 中，unmarried 一词是多余的。

dsense.name: redundant
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having lost your job because your employer no longer needs you
trans_examp.trans_cn: 失业的，被解雇的，被裁减的

example.eg: To keep the company alive, half the workforce is being made redundant.
example.egtrans: 为了使公司生存下去，一半的员工要被裁掉。

example.eg: New technology often makes old skills and even whole communities redundant.
example.egtrans: 新技术常常会使古老的技艺甚至是某个行业完全消失。
